mapper.select: select c.id,c.type,c.value_id as valueId, g.brief,g.pic_url as picUrl,g.name,g.retail_price as retailPrice from cskaoyan_mall_collect c left join cskaoyan_mall_goods g on c.value_id = g.id where c.user_id = #{userId} and c.type = #{type} and c.deleted = 0
select count(id) from cskaoyan_mall_collect where user_id = #{userId} and value_id = #{valueId}
mapper.delete: delete from cskaoyan_mall_collect where user_id = #{userId} and value_id = #{valueId}
